summary: Atmospheric radiation parameters corresponding to Remote Sensing Systems (RSS) Resampled brightness temperature
keywords: EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > ATMOSPHERIC RADIATION > SPECTRAL IRRADIANCE
EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > ATMOSPHERIC RADIATION > TRANSMITTANCE
title: Atmospheric radiation parameters computed from ERA5 profile on a 0.25 degree Earth grid, time interpolated to satellite overpass time
history: Created from ERA5 data downloaded from the Copernicus Climate Data Store using the RSS radiative transfer model
